dotnetType.name: FloatDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new float deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FloatSchema" />; an unsuccessful
            result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a float deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FloatDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
